setup: 1. Update brandConfig with your company details and brand colors
4. Go to Supabase Dashboard > Authentication > Email Templates
5. For each template type, paste the corresponding htmlTemplate
6. Test each template before deploying to production
customization: Adjust colors in the style attributes to match your brand
Modify font-family to match your website typography
Change border-radius values for sharper or rounder corners
Update padding/spacing values for tighter or looser layouts
Add your logo URL and ensure it's publicly accessible
notes: All templates use inline CSS for maximum email client compatibility
Templates are responsive and work on mobile devices
Design is intentionally minimal and formal
Supabase template variables ({{ .ConfirmationURL }}, etc.) will be replaced automatically
HelloACA branding uses #4ECCA3 primary color and professional tone
